zōu
surname Zou; vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
фамилия Цзоу; вассальное государство во времена династии Чжоу (1046-256 до н.э.) на юго-востоке провинции Шаньдун

(Simplified: 邹)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 芻 indicates the sound; 阝 (place) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 芻 [ chú ] to mow, to cut grass; hay, fodder
    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city
①中國周代諸侯國名，在今山東省鄒縣東南。
②姓氏。
鄒城 [ zōu chéng ]: Zoucheng county level city in Jining 济宁 , Shandong
鄒城市 [ zōu chéng shì ]: Zoucheng county level city in Jining 济宁 , Shandong
鄒容 [ zōu róng ]: Zou Rong (1885-1905), a martyr of the anti-Qing revolution, died in jail in 1905
鄒平 [ zōu píng ]: Zouping county in Binzhou 滨州 , Shandong
鄒平縣 [ zōu píng xiàn ]: Zouping county in Binzhou 滨州 , Shandong

鄒字的基本解释

鄒
zōu
见“邹”。

鄒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zōu］
［《廣韻》側鳩切，平尤，莊。］
“邹1”的繁体字。
(1)春秋邾国。曹姓，子爵。武王时始受封。战国时鲁穆公改为邹。唐为邹县，历代因之。故地在今山东省邹县一带。
(2)狭小；有村气不冠冕者。
(3)指货物质量低劣。
(4)通“騶”。参见“鄒虞”。
(5)见“鄒搜”。
(6)姓。汉有邹阳。见《史记·鲁仲连邹阳列传》。
[②]［jù］
“邹2”的繁体字。
颜浊邹，人名。

鄒字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　鄒； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1275第21
【唐韻】【正韻】側鳩切【集韻】【韻會】甾尤切，?音騶。【說文】魯縣，古邾婁國，帝顓頊之後所封。【徐曰】《孟子題辭》邾國至孟子時，魯穆公攺曰鄒。　又通作騶。【史記·孟軻傳】孟子，騶人也。　又姓。【廣韻】漢有鄒陽。　又【字彙補】從娶切，音聚。【史記·孔子世家】如顏濁鄒之徒。【正義】鄒，音聚。俗省作邹。互詳前郰字註。

Zou
Basic explanation of words
Zou
zōu
See "Zou".
Zou
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zōu］
["Guangyun" side dove cut, Pingyou, Zhuang. ]
Traditional characters of "邹1".
(1) The Spring and Autumn Period. Surnamed Cao, Viscount. He was given a ban when he was King Wu. During the Warring States Period, Lu Mugong was changed to Zou. The Tang Dynasty is Zou County, and it has been in the past. The old place is in the area of Zou County, Shandong Province.
(2) Small and narrow; there are villagers who do not crown themselves.
(3) Refers to the poor quality of the goods.
(4) Through "驺". See "Zou Yu".
(5) See "Zou Sou".
(6) Last name. There was Zou Yang in the Han Dynasty. See "Historical Biographies of Lu Zhonglian and Zou Yang".
[②]［jù］
Traditional characters for "邹2".
Yan Zhuozou, name.
Zou
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　 Zou; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1275 21
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Side Dove Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Ziyou cut,? Yin Mo. [Said the text] Lu County, Gulu Lou State, was sealed after Emperor Zhuanxu. [Xu Yue] "The Inscription of Mencius", Lu Mu Gongxian said Zou when he arrived at Mencius.　It's another pass. [Historical Records·Meng Ke Biography] Mencius is also a man.　Another last name. [Guang Yun] Han had Zou Yang.　[Word Supplement] Cong Marry and Cut, Sound Gathering. [Historical Records·Confucius Family] Like Yan Zhuo Zou's disciple. [Justice] Zou, music gathering. The province is made by Zou. Mutual details before the word note.
